tool_description: Validates ARIA attributes, roles, properties, and states for proper implementation and accessibility compliance.

html_content.description: HTML content containing ARIA attributes to validate

check_required_props.description: Whether to validate required ARIA properties

validate_role_usage.description: Whether to validate proper role usage

strict_validation.description: Whether to apply strict ARIA specification validation

error_messages: Invalid HTML content: Provide valid HTML with ARIA attributes to validate.

usage: Provide HTML content to validate all ARIA attributes, roles, and properties. Configure validation strictness and specific checks as needed.

aria_elements.description: Number of elements with ARIA attributes

valid_roles.description: Number of elements with valid ARIA roles

invalid_roles.description: Number of elements with invalid ARIA roles

property_violations.description: List of ARIA property and state violations
